snippet.title: The Callisto Protocol - Cinematic Trailer Reveal
snippet.description:
Watch the cinematic trailer reveal of The Callisto Protocol, a new story-driven, single-player survival horror game from the creators of Dead Space. Coming 2022 to PC and Consoles. #CallistoTheGame

 Follow The Callisto Protocol:
Website: http://www.callistothegame.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Callistothegame
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Callistothegame
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/Callistothegame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/tetqmCgwJz

 
About Striking Distance Studios:

Based in San Ramon, CA, in the San Francisco Bay Area, Striking Distance Studios is a AAA development studio committed to crafting thought-provoking immersive experiences, driven by a passion for quality and excellence. Striking Distance is helmed by Glen Schofield, the creator of Dead Space and founder of Sledgehammer Games. The Callisto Protocol is the first game from Striking Distance Studios, a 150-person team of industry veterans. For more information about Striking Distance Studios, please visit www.StrikingDistanceStudios.com or follow the company on Twitter @SD_Studios.

 
About KRAFTON, Inc.:

KRAFTON, Inc. is a collective of independent game development teams responsible for various entertainment properties, including PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS and TERA. The name, which is derived from the word craftsmanship, is an acknowledgment of the company’s never-ending pursuit of innovation and creating engaging experiences. KRAFTON currently consists of PUBG Corporation, Bluehole, Striking Distance Studios, PNIX, and Delusion. For more information about KRAFTON, Inc., please visit https://www.krafton.com

© 2020 Striking Distance Studios. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. STRIKING DISTANCE STUDIOS and THE CALLISTO PROTOCOL are trademarks or service marks of Striking Distance Studios. KRAFTON is a registered trademark or service mark of Krafton, Inc.
